Text: Nice game, simple point & click. Make sure you use the unpack.bat. thanks Stun, good clean upload as always, Cheers.
I'm so confused. I've seen this new remastered version in 3 different release sizes. This one is only ~400 megs, then I've seen one on 700 megs, and another on whopping 1,2 gb :o what to believe?!
